name: Cybersimp
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

unzip file,
run cybersimp.exe for playable version
run cybersimpbots.exe for autonomous version

LMB for left punch
RMB for right punch
AD for movement

IMPORTANT:

I made this game during my lunch break in highschool like 4 years ago so its a broken piece of garbage. The framerate isn't even limited so it worked correctly on the original machine it was built on and literally nothing else. So if it's too fast then that's you're problem for trying to get anything out of this ancient relic.

The year is 1994,

Yellow men and their sons everywhere celebrate the birth of a new pastime,
VIRTUAL REALITY

This cursed reality amalgamates the users deepest desires into a physical being.
Play as homer, as he defends his sanity from his other worldly desires to slay his own son.

virtual reality not included

Made with Löve and coded in lua
2016
